name: Glitch Tanks
description:
Information about special ammo and controls is in the settings menu.

Tips: 

- Use P or ESC to pause and access information, go back to the main menu, or restart a round (already awarded points won't be reset).

- Use golden or white bullets to block incoming threats

- Tap the left or right key for a short time to consistently turn 1/16 of a circle, allowing for easier wall glitch lineups.

- Some enemies are very good at dodging, try and corner them with bullets. They will often panic, and not wall glitch out in time.

- If a level is too hard, you can come back to it later and go to the next one by clicking it in the level select

I am thinking of making a sequel with steam online multiplayer and a level editor, so if this would be your jam, let me know,
